name: NerdCred++
tagline: Resources for customizing your bash prompt
body:
### NerdCred++; The art of customizing your bash prompt.
So you want a shiny lightning bolt on your bash prompt, but don't know where to start, huh? 
Well, hopefully you've been able to attend our workshop in order to get the basics down, but if not we've got you covered!

```
$ vim ~/.bashrc
$ source ~/.bashrc
```

### Authors and Contributors
You can find Rachel Walker (@raychatter) and Pamela Ocampo (@pamo) all around the web. We primarily build things, but always take pride and adding a little flair to our workspace.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
